GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with a default limit of 10 and a total_count of number of articles property

POST/api/articles.description: posts an article with a default image_url

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of articles that match article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments that match article_id
